name: Nomadi
desc: Nomadi Sushi & Noodle, located in Blankenberge, Belgium offers fresh sushi, flavorful noodle dishes, and Asian specialties in a cozy setting. Known for friendly service and quality ingredients, it’s a local favorite for casual dining or takeout.

name: Al Mallah
desc: Al Mallah is a popular Lebanese street food spot in Dubai, known for its tasty shawarmas, falafel, and fresh juices. With its vibrant vibe and long-standing reputation, it’s a go-to for quick, authentic bites.

name: Maguro House
desc: Maguro House is a Japanese restaurant in Canada, offering a diverse menu that includes sushi, sashimi, ramen, and more. Known for its fresh ingredients and flavorful dishes, it has become a local favorite for Japanese cuisine enthusiasts.

name: Donde Pipe
desc: Donde Pipe Comida Rápida is a popular eatery in Spain, offering a variety of fast food options including burgers, hot dogs, and salchipapas. Known for its flavorful dishes and friendly service, it's a go-to spot of seeking quick and satisfying meals.

name: Fuoco
desc: Fuoco is a popular fast-casual restaurant in Dhaka, known for its signature Meatbox, cheesy platters, and loaded fast food. With several branches across the city, it’s a go-to spot for bold flavors and satisfying meals.

name: Life with Cacao
desc: Life with Cacao is a Kuwaiti café offering a premium all-day dining experience focused on chocolate. Known for its desserts, breakfast, and savory dishes, it’s a favorite across the GCC for sweet and cozy moments.

name: Switch Food
desc: Switch Food is a modern Moroccan fast-casual restaurant known for blending traditional flavors with contemporary twists. With locations in cities like Casablanca and Rabat, it’s popular for its tagines, couscous, and creative wraps.

name: Bubbles Cafe
desc: Bubbles Caffe in Bujumbura, Burundi, is a cozy spot offering a range of local and international dishes, along with unique services like a barbershop and spa. It’s a unique destination for both dining and relaxation.
